name: Build and Push Lucky Home Assistant Addon

on:
  workflow_dispatch:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
    paths:
      - 'lucky/**'
      - '.github/workflows/build-lucky.yml'

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
      packages: write

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Install build tools
        run: |
          sudo apt-get update
          sudo apt-get install -y jq

      - name: Login to Docker Hub
        uses: docker/login-action@v3
        with:
          username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}
          password: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_PASSWORD }}

      - name: Login to GHCR
        uses: docker/login-action@v3
        with:
          registry: ghcr.io
          username: ${{ github.actor }}
          password: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}

      - name: Get lowercase repo owner
        run: echo "REPO_OWNER_LC=${GITHUB_REPOSITORY_OWNER,,}" >> $GITHUB_ENV

      - name: Extract addon metadata
        id: extract_meta
        run: |
          ADDON_DIR="lucky"
          CONFIG_PATH="${ADDON_DIR}/config.json"
          
          if [[ -f "$CONFIG_PATH" ]]; then
            VERSION=$(jq -r .version "$CONFIG_PATH")
            ADDON_NAME=$(jq -r .name "$CONFIG_PATH")
          else
            echo "❌ ERROR: $CONFIG_PATH not found!"
            exit 1
          fi
          
          echo "ADDON_NAME=$ADDON_NAME" >> $GITHUB_ENV
          echo "VERSION=$VERSION" >> $GITHUB_ENV
          echo "💡 ADDON_NAME=$ADDON_NAME"
          echo "💡 VERSION=$VERSION"

      - name: Setup QEMU
        uses: docker/setup-qemu-action@v3

      - name: Setup Docker Buildx
        uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v3

      - name: Build and push Lucky Home Assistant Addon
        uses: docker/build-push-action@v5
        with:
          context: lucky
          file: lucky/Dockerfile
          platforms: |
            linux/amd64
            linux/arm64
            linux/arm/v7
          push: true
          tags: |
            ghcr.io/${{ env.REPO_OWNER_LC }}/lucky-hassio:${{ env.VERSION }}
            ghcr.io/${{ env.REPO_OWNER_LC }}/lucky-hassio:latest
            ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}/lucky-hassio:${{ env.VERSION }}
            ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}/lucky-hassio:latest
          cache-from: type=gha
          cache-to: type=gha,mode=max
